chat.title: ICU Bowel protocol
chat.message:
Recommend having all bowel care protocols reviewed (Do we have a working group like they do in other sites?) with organization into the following groups:
  • Bowel care - adult
  • Bowel care - adult with fluid restriction (e.g. cirrhosis, heart failure)
  • Bowel care - renal (i.e. advanced CKD patients need to avoid high potassium/phosphate)
  • Bowel care - geriatric
  • Bowel care - opioid dependent
  • Bowel care - ICU
  • Bowel care - spinal patient
      • I'm sure there are some I haven't thought of. This is missing a lot of the key messaging to nursing staff as to what to watch out for. Here is an example of the VCH ICU bowel care guidelines https://ubccriticalcaremedicine.ca/resources/pdf/ICU guideline bowel protocol May 2011.pdf
